flawed_nl_solution:
Vinnie has written a total of 450 words on Saturday + 650 words on Sunday = <<450+650=11000>>11000 words.
He has therefore exceeded the limit by 11000 written words - 1000 word limit = <<11000-1000=10000>>10000 words.
#### 10000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1100, not 11000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
